MemoryInfobox.description: 'Great slaughter and fire drove most creatures and people from the woods. A hunter who remained behind was troubled by Wolf|wolves come to feed on the dead.'

General_Description: '''The Hunter Remains''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: In a camp in the woods, Kassandra met a hunter with problems.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Need something?''
*'''Hunter:''' ''I've hunted in this forest for years. I will not abandon it. I will be here as it heals.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Is there enough game left for you to hunt?''
*'''Hunter:''' ''Game remains and more will return. But I must protect myself. Carcasses are drawing out [[Wolf|wolves]] in droves. Not to mention the bandits who comb the woods looking for easy victims.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''And of course, you want me to kill them all.''
*'''Hunter:''' ''No bandit should be left standing.''
(Accept - I'll hunt the outlaws.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You can count on me.''
*'''Hunter:''' ''Good. Get it done soon.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You can leave everything to me.''
Kassandra sought out the bandits and killed them. Afterwards, she returned to the hunter.
*'''Hunter:''' ''You're back. Have you killed them?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I took care of them. Every last one.''
*'''Hunter:''' ''Take this as thanks, [[mercenary]]. You did good work.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I always finish what I've started.''
The hunter rewarded Kassandra.
Section_Outcome: At the request of the hunter, Kassandra sought out and killed the bandits.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
